    Pipeline Engineer

    A Data Driven Approach to Pipeline Projects

    Pipeline Engineer is a QGIS Plugin that aims to speed up engineering work flows on pipeline projects.

    Currently, Pipeline Engineer can help with fixing network topology, abstracting and simulating different flow models and generating Bills of Material.

    Features

    Explore some of the features Pipeline Engineer has available.
